justification: Model notes B’s traits but misreads incentives: a 1-7, conservative, veteran-preferring manager needing wins won’t trade a Tier 1 RB and solid veteran WR for a doubtful boom/bust WR and a Tier 4 volatile RB. Offer conflicts with B’s volume/stability priorities and urgency. Reasoning mentions contrarianism but uses it to justify the opposite of B’s stated values. Acceptance probability is unrealistic.
